content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you having trouble with heating, cooling, or another system?
Yes, my AC isn’t working well. I need it checked ASAP, but before we go further, don’t waste my time—I hate getting passed around.
I’m here to help you directly! May I get your name so I can set up the service for your AC issue?
This better not be a waste of time. It’s Patricia.
Thank you, Patricia. Can you please provide the address where your AC needs service?
Why do you need my address if you don’t know your own service area? This is why I hate these things. 1887 Mainland Dr, Elmdale.
Thanks for your address, Patricia. I’ll confirm if you’re in our service area and get your appointment started.
You’re within our service area. Could you tell me your ideal date and time for us to check your AC system?
Is this going to be one of those ‘any time between 8 and 6’ things? I work. I need a real time, or there’s no point.
I completely understand, Patricia. We can work to arrange a specific time. What day and time window would work best for you? I’ll check for precise availability.
Tomorrow at noon sharp, or don’t bother. And I don’t want to wait. Will your techs actually show up at 12?
Let me check our team’s calendar for a technician who can arrive precisely at noon tomorrow. One moment, please.
We can schedule your appointment for noon tomorrow. Our technician will strive to arrive right at that time, but please allow up to 15 minutes for traffic. Shall I confirm the appointment?
Honestly, if you can’t guarantee noon, it’s useless. The last company said the same thing and was late. I’m sick of this. Forget it.
reason: Customer refused to schedule due to unwillingness to accept any possible delay.
